map.name: kitchen
map.info: This is a well furnished kitchen.

map.name: hallway
map.info:
The hallway is completely dark, except for a soft light 
coming around the edges of doors to the north and east.

map.name: living room
map.info:
A large room well lit room, with wide windows opening to a scenic
horizon.

items.name: tv
items.info:
A wide screen TV is fixed on the wall to the kitchen. 
<off:It is turned off.><on:It is showing a news program.>

items.name: sofa
items.contents_prefix: Between the sofa's pillows there's a

items.name: remote
items.info: A black remote control, with buttons for powering the TV and changing channels. <powered:A red LED light on the remote is lit.>

items.name: key
items.info: This is a small brass key.

items.name: bowl
items.info: A small white ceramic bowl<milk: filled with milk><water: filled with water>.

items.name: drawer
items.info:
A drawer at the top side of the cupboard. 
<open:It is open.><closed:It is closed.>

items.name: cupboard
items.info:
This is an ordinary kitchen cupboard, with a drawer 
and a door. <closed:The cupboard is closed.><open:The cupboard is open.>

items.name: table
items.info:
This is a wide kitchen table, fixed against the western wall, with a
kitchen sink installed.

items.name: refrigerator
items.info:
This is a large and modern looking refrigerator.<open: The fridge door 
is open and the light inside is on.>

items.name: sink
items.info: The sink has faucets for cold and hot water.

items.name: horizon
items.info:
Outside the window flat fields form a patchwork of 
hues of green and are bounded in the distance by forested hills.
It is a bright summer day and the sun is high in the clear blue sky.
